2048.card-desc: try to get to the largest number possible!

a dark room.card-desc: a mysterious game about survival and exploration.

agario minigame.card-desc: consume cells to grow larger while avoiding others.

align 4.card-desc: connect four in a row to win!

basket random.card-desc: shoot hoops in a fast paced basketball challenge.

basketball stars.card-desc: compete in 1v1 basketball matches with special skills.

bike mania.card-desc: perform stunts and race on your bike.

boxing random.card-desc: fight against opponents in a boxing ring.

breaklock.card-desc: solve puzzles to unlock various challenges.

celeste.card-desc: a platformer about climbing a mountain.

chroma.card-desc: colorful puzzles that challenge your logic.

colorun.card-desc: run and change colors to avoid obstacles.

cookie clicker.card-desc: try not to get addicted in this incremental/idle game about cookies.
cookie clicker.note: NOTE: Make sure to frequently backup your save data just in case. Your save data could also be imported from the original cookie clicker website.

cubefield.card-desc: navigate a field of cubes while avoiding collisions.

dinosaur.card-desc: help the dinosaur survive through an endless desert.

donut boy.card-desc: a platformer filled with delicious donuts and challenges.

doodle jump.card-desc: jump your way up while avoiding obstacles.

fire truck dash.card-desc: drive a fire truck to rescue people in danger.

fireboy and watergirl forest temple.card-desc: cooperate to solve puzzles in the forest temple.

flakboy.card-desc: test out your destructive devices on Flakboy.

flappy 2048.card-desc: a blend of flappy and 2048 mechanics.

flappybird.card-desc: navigate through pipes by tapping the screen.

friday night funkin vs ex.card-desc: battle through rhythm challenges in this music game.

friday night funkin week 6.card-desc: continue the rhythm battles with new characters.

friendlyfire.card-desc: team up or face off in this multiplayer arena.

geometry dash remastered.card-desc: jump and fly through dangerous passages.

google snake.card-desc: guide the snake to eat and grow while avoiding walls.

google solitaire.card-desc: play the classic card game of Solitaire.

gopher kart.card-desc: race against opponents in this karting adventure.

gun knight.card-desc: battle through levels with various weapons.

hacker typer.card-desc: type like a hacker in a fun simulation.

hexgl.card-desc: fast paced racing in a futuristic world.

hextris.card-desc: a hexagonal twist on the classic Tetris.

hill racing.card-desc: drive up and down hills in this fun racer.

mc classic.card-desc: a classic block building and exploration game.

minesweeper.card-desc: clear the minefield without detonating bombs.

moto x3m.card-desc: perform stunts and complete courses on your motorcycle.

moto x3m pool party.card-desc: race through pool themed levels on your bike.

moto x3m spooky land.card-desc: navigate through spooky themed levels on your motorcycle.

moto x3m winter.card-desc: race through winter themed courses on your bike.

muffin knight.card-desc: a platformer filled with muffins and adventures.

pacman.card-desc: eat dots and avoid ghosts in this classic arcade game.

radius raid.card-desc: navigate through obstacles in a challenging setting.

retro bowl.card-desc: play a nostalgic game of American football.

ritz.card-desc: a strategic game of tiles and tactics.

run 3.card-desc: run and jump through an endless space tunnel.

running bot xmas gifts.card-desc: guide your robot to collect Christmas gifts.

sans fight.card-desc: engage in an epic battle with Sans from Undertale.

sm64.card-desc: explore a 3D world in this classic platformer.

soccer random.card-desc: play quick matches of soccer with random teams.

spaceinvaders.card-desc: defend against waves of alien invaders.

super smash flash 2a.card-desc: battle with your favorite characters in this crossover.

super smash flash 2b.card-desc: continue the ultimate fighting adventure with new characters.

slope.card-desc: play as a ball and roll down an endless slope!

tanktrouble.card-desc: battle against friends in tank warfare.

there is no game.card-desc: a unique experience that plays with the concept of gaming.

unfair dyne.card-desc: an action packed game filled with unfair challenges.

uno.card-desc: play the classic card game with friends.

vex3.card-desc: navigate through challenging levels and obstacles.

vex4.card-desc: the sequel with even more challenging levels.

vex5.card-desc: continue the journey with new mechanics and challenges.

volley random.card-desc: play volleyball matches with random teams.

webgl rollingsky.card-desc: roll and jump through various challenging levels.

wordle.card-desc: guess the hidden word in six attempts.

zombotron.card-desc: battle against zombies in this action packed platformer.

zombotron 2.card-desc: the sequel with more levels and zombies to defeat.

zombotron 2 time machine.card-desc: time travel to defeat zombies in new environments.

zombsroyale.card-desc: battle royale gameplay with zombie survival elements.
